scriptureVerse.verse: Let no one despise you for your youth, but set the believers an example in speech, in conduct, in love, in faith, in purity. Until I come, devote yourself to the public reading of Scripture, to exhortation, to teaching.

body: Logos Student Ministries desires to see students grow in the word of God while being intentional about living out the truth of the word of God. We want to be a community of people that provide the freedom to wrestle with the text while cultivating and facilitating the spiritual growth and development of our students. We want to see every student in Logos Student Ministries grow in their reliance of scripture, while operating in an attitude of service, as they grow in grace in a lifestyle of true Gospel witness.

faq.question: What's the best way to get my student plugged into Logos Student Ministry?
faq.answer: We have an AMAZING Team that is ready and excited to welcome your student into our space each time we gather. We will connect your student and welcome them in, get them plugged into a group, and make sure they have an amazing time! We gather every other Sunday 1:30p-3p.

faq.question: As a parent, can I come check out Logos Student Ministry?
faq.answer: We are very intentional about who comes back into our space on a Sunday, for the safety of our students. Each Team member and adult who is present in the space has to take a background check prior to being into our space. However, if you want to come and check things out, please connect with someone on our Team beforehand so they can host you on that day. Feel free to email our Team using the contact form below and we can set something up!

faq.question: Where does Logos Student Ministry meet?
faq.answer: We meet every other Sunday, WeWork Wonder Bread Factory (641 S St NW, Washington, DC 20001) on the third floor from 1:30p to 3p. We encourage you to attend our 11:30 gathering prior to coming to Passion Students!

faq.question: What's the best way to get updates on what is happening in Passion Students?
faq.answer: The best way to receive updates from our Team is by signing up on our email list. Scroll to the bottom of this page and sign-up for more information and to start receiving updates. Our Team will be sending out an email at the beginning of each month, with details about all that’s coming up in the month ahead.

faq.question: How do I become a youth leader within Logos Student Ministry
faq.answer: Currently, our Team has an amazing group of Door Holders leading our middle + high school students and we are not adding any additional leaders. If you are interested in serving in Passion Students in the future, please fill out the form below. Until then, we want to encourage you to serve as a Door Holder on another one of our AMAZING teams at Passion City Church D.C. Check out our other Door Holder teams here.

faq.question: How do I get in touch with the Logos Student Ministry team?
faq.answer: The best way to get in touch with our Team is to fill out the email form below or email students.dc@passioncitychurch.com with any questions you may have.
